thumb.title: WAIL / 健音テイ
thumb.description: WAILThe sunset-tinted streets are quietly sinking again today夕焼け染まる街並みが 今日もまた静かに沈んでいくWalking home alone, a scar is deeply engraved in my heart一人歩く帰り道 胸に深く刻まれた傷跡Fragments of memories dance in the wind, rising and disappearing思い出の欠片が風に舞う 舞い上がっては消えていくIn the recurring days, I search for the warmth I lost繰り返す日々の中で 失われた温もりを捜してるThe smile from that day is still vividly burned into my eyelidsあの日の笑顔 鮮やかに 今も瞼に焼き付いてるI can't go to that place where laughter echoed笑い声 響いていた あの場所へは行けないOnly time flows by, everything changes時だけが流れ過ぎてゆく 何もかもが変わり果ててAll that's left is silence and this growing sadness残されたのは 静寂と 募るばかりのこの悲しみWail, even if I scream, it doesn't reach anyone慟哭 叫び出しても届かないWail, only emptiness tightens my chest慟哭 空しさだけが胸を締め付けるWail, how long will this pain continue慟哭 この痛みはいつまで続くのWail, I have to face the past that I can't erase慟哭 消せない過去と 向き合わなきゃいけないMusic,Lyric,All Sound Prog : SonataIllust : Kim
